user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (selectionsyndicate@techforward.com) an update on the candidate assessments and check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

When you have a moment, could you please:

1. Send an updated overview of all current candidate assessments to selectionsyndicate@techforward.com.  
2. Check your Notion workspace for any relevant details or notes and include those in the update.

Thank you very much—I appreciate your help!

Best,  
[Your Name]  
(on behalf of the Selection Syndicate)

final_output:
